mapper.insert: insert into tb_mbti_category values( default, #{mbtiCategoryRegisterId}, #{mbtiCategoryName}, #{mbtiCategoryTitle}, #{mbtiCategoryDescription}, #{mbtiCategoryImg}, now(), now() )
insert into tb_mbti values( default, #{mbtiCode}, #{mbtiCategoryId}, #{mbtiRegisterId}, #{mbtiTitle}, #{mbtiImg}, now(), now() )

insert into tb_mbti_result values( default, #{mbtiResultRegisterId}, #{mbtiResultCategoryName}, #{mbtiResultTitle}, #{mbtiResultSummary}, #{mbtiResultContent}, #{mbtiResultImg}, #{mbtiResultStatus}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update tb_mbti_category set mbti_category_register_id = #{registerId}, mbti_category_name = #{mbtiCategoryName}, mbti_category_title = #{mbtiCategoryTitle}, mbti_category_description = #{mbtiCategoryDescription}, mbti_category_img = #{mbtiCategoryImg}, update_date = now() where mbti_category_id = #{mbtiCategoryId}
update tb_mbti set mbti_register_id = #{registerId}, mbti_title = #{mbtiTitle}, mbti_img = #{mbtiImg}, update_date = now() where mbti_id = #{mbtiId}

update tb_mbti_result set mbti_result_register_id = #{registerId}, mbti_result_title = #{mbtiResultTitle}, mbti_result_category_name = #{mbtiResultCategoryName}, mbti_result_img = #{mbtiResultImg}, mbti_result_summary = #{mbtiResultSummary}, mbti_result_content = #{mbtiResultContent}, mbti_result_status = #{mbtiResultStatus}, update_date = now() where mbti_result_id = #{resultId}

mapper.select: select mc.mbti_category_id, mc.mbti_category_register_id, mc.mbti_category_name, mc.mbti_category_title, mc.mbti_category_description, mc.mbti_category_img, (select count(*) from tb_mbti_category) as totalCount, mc.create_date, mc.update_date, u.user_id, u.name from tb_mbti_category mc left outer join tb_user u on(u.user_id = mc.mbti_category_register_id)

select mbti_category_id, mbti_category_register_id, mbti_category_name, mbti_category_title, mbti_category_description, mbti_category_img, create_date, update_date from tb_mbti_category where mbti_category_id = #{categoryId}

select m.mbti_id, m.mbti_code, m.mbti_category_id, m.mbti_register_id, m.mbti_title, m.mbti_img, count(*) over () as totalCount, m.create_date, m.update_date, (select u.name from tb_user u where u.user_id = m.mbti_register_id) as name, (select mc.mbti_category_name from tb_mbti_category mc where m.mbti_category_id = mc.mbti_category_id) as mbtiCategoryName from tb_mbti m where 1 = 1
and 1 = 1
and m.mbti_category_id = #{filter}
and (m.mbti_code like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%') or m.mbti_title like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%'))
and m.mbti_code like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%')
and m.mbti_title like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%')
limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}

select m.mbti_id, m.mbti_code, m.mbti_category_id, m.mbti_register_id, m.mbti_title, m.mbti_img, m.create_date, m.update_date, mo.mbti_option_id, mo.mbti_id, mo.option_name, mo.option_score, (select u.name from tb_user u where u.user_id = m.mbti_register_id) as name, (select mbti_category_name from tb_mbti_category mc where mc.mbti_category_id = m.mbti_category_id) as mbtiCategoryName from tb_mbti m left outer join tb_mbti_option mo on m.mbti_id = mo.mbti_id where m.mbti_id = #{mbtiId}

select mbti_result_id, mbti_result_register_id, mbti_result_category_name, mbti_result_title, mbti_result_summary, mbti_result_content, mbti_result_img, mbti_result_status, create_date, update_date from tb_mbti_result where mbti_result_id = #{resultId}
